Eon-X Aquilor (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [2,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [680pts]

      • Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar [300pts]

        Selections: Ghal Maraz, the Hammer of Sigmar

        Categories: CELESTANT-PRIME, HERO, HUMAN, CELESTIAL, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader

        Unit: Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar, Unit Abilities: Cometstrike Sceptre, Fly, Orrery of Celestial Fates, Retribution from On High, Weapon: Ghal Maraz, the Hammer of Sigmar


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar 12"8103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Cometstrike Sceptre In your shooting phase, you can pick a point on the battlefield within 24" of this model that is visible to them. Each unit within D6" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Orrery of Celestial Fates Once per turn, you can change one of the following dice rolls to a roll of your choice. Apply any modifiers to the new roll: • One hit roll for an attack made by this model • One wound roll for an attack made by this model • One save roll for an attack that targets this model • One run roll for this model • One charge roll for this model • One roll that determines the range or number of mortal wounds for this model’s Cometstrike Sceptre
        Retribution from On High Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Heavens as a reserve unit. If you do so, at the end of your movement phase you must declare whether this model will remain in reserve or strike from the Heavens. If this model remains in reserve, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of Ghal Maraz until the end of the battle. If this model strikes from the Heavens, set this model up on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units. In addition, if this model strikes from the Heavens, until your next hero phase subtract 2 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Ghal Maraz, the Hammer of Sigmar Melee2"33+2+-33

      • Lord-Castellant [120pts]

        Selections: 0. God-forged Blade, 0. We Cannot Fail, Castellant's Halberd, General

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader, LORD-CASTELLANT, General, 6_under_wounds, Artefact

        Artefact: God-forged Blade, Command Trait: We Cannot Fail, Unit: Lord-Castellant, Unit Abilities: Faithful Gryph-hound, Warding Lantern, Weapon: Castellant's Halberd

        • Faithful Gryph-hound

          Selections: Beak and Claws

          Categories: CELESTIAL, GRYPH-HOUNDS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

          Unit: Gryph-Hounds, Unit Abilities: Darting Attacks, Gryph-Hound Alpha, Loyal Companion, Warning Cry, Weapon: Beak and Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details
        God-forged Blade Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with the God-forged Blade is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        We Cannot Fail Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR unit wholly within 9" of this general. On a 6+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Gryph-Hounds 9"36-
        Lord-Castellant 5"693+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Darting Attacks Each time this unit attacks, it can make a 6" retreat move after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Faithful Gryph-hound The first time this model is set up on the battlefield, you can call a GRYPH-HOUND unit consisting of a single model to the battlefield and add it to your army. Set up the GRYPH-HOUND wholly within 3" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Gryph-Hound Alpha If a unit of Gryph-hounds has 3 or more models, one Gryph-hound can be a Gryph-hound Alpha. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Gryph-hound Alpha’s Beak and Claws.
        Loyal Companion Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Beak and Claws while this unit is wholly within 6" of a friendly LORD-CASTELLANT or LORD-VERITANT.
        Warding Lantern In your hero phase, pick either a CHAOS unit or a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit that is wholly within 18" of this model. The same unit cannot be picked as the target of a warding lantern more than once in the same hero phase. If a CHAOS unit is picked, it suffers 1 mortal wound. If a CHAOS DAEMON unit is picked it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead. If a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit is picked, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, each time you make a save roll of 7+ for an attack that targets that unit, you can heal 1 wound allocated to a model from that unit.
        Warning Cry If a reserve enemy unit is set up on the battlefield for the first time within 10" of this unit, friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units wholly within 9" of this unit can attack that reserve unit with all of the missile weapons they are armed with. A unit that uses this ability to attack a reserve unit cannot use this ability to attack another reserve unit in the same phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Beak and Claws Melee1"23+4+-1
        Castellant's Halberd Melee2"33+3+-12

      • Vandus Hammerhand [260pts]

        Selections: 2. Thunder Caller, Claws and Fangs, Heldensen

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HERO, HUMAN, LORD-CELESTANT, VANDUS HAMMERHAND, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, DRACOTH, HAMMERS OF SIGMAR, Leader

        Command Trait: Vengeful Determination, Unit: Vandus Hammerhand, Unit Abilities: Heldensen, Intolerable Damage, Lord of the Hammerhands, Mount, Storm Breath, Thunder Caller, Weapon: Claws and Fangs, Heldensen


        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Vengeful Determination You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Vandus Hammerhand 10"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Heldensen Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of Heldensen if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Intolerable Damage If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Dracoth’s Claws and Fangs is 6, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6 instead of 1.
        Lord of the Hammerhands Friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units wholly within 24" of this model at the start of the battleshock phase do not take battleshock tests.
        Mount Vandus’ Dracoth, Calanax, attacks with its Claws and Fangs.
        Storm Breath In your shooting phase, you can pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of this model that is visible to them. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 2" of that point. On a 4+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Thunder Caller This model’s Storm Breath ability has a range of 16" rather than 12".
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Claws and Fangs Melee1"43+3+-11
        Heldensen Melee2"33+2+-13

      • Liberators [180pts]

        Selections: 2x 5 Liberators, 2x Grandhammer, Honoured Retinue, Warhammer and Shield

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, LIBERATORS, REDEEMER, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Battleline

        Battle Trait: Wise Council, Unit: Liberator, Unit Abilities: Lay Low the Tyrants, Liberator-Prime, Paired Weapons, Sigmarite Shields, Weapon: Grandhammer, Warhammer(s)


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Wise Council At the start of your hero phase, if your general is within 3" of their adjutant, roll a dice. On a 4+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Liberator 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Lay Low the Tyrants You can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target an enemy unit with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or more.
        Liberator-Prime The leader of this unit is a Liberator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Liberator-Prime’s melee weapon.
        Paired Weapons Each unmodified hit roll of 6 made for a model armed with either a pair or warhammers or a pair of warblades inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sigmarite Shields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying Sigmarite Shields.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Grandhammer Melee1"24+3+-12
        Warhammer(s) Melee1"24+3+-1

    • Other [860pts]

      • Decimators [340pts]

        Selections: 2x 5 Decimators [340pts], Starsoul Mace, Thunderaxe

        Categories: CELESTIAL, DECIMATORS, HUMAN, PALADIN, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Decimator, Unit Abilities: Cleaving Blow, Decimator-Prime, Grim Harvesters, Starsoul Mace, Weapon: Starsoul Mace, Thunderaxe


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Decimator 4"374+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Cleaving Blow The Attacks characteristic of a Thunderaxe is equal to the number of enemy models within 2" of the attacking model when the number of attacks made with the weapon is determined.
        Decimator-Prime The leader of this unit is a Decimator-Prime. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by a Decimator-Prime.
        Grim Harvesters Subtract 2 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of one or more friendly units of DECIMATORS in the battleshock phase.
        Starsoul Mace Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Starsoul Mace. Instead, roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, the target unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6+, the target unit suffers D3+1 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Starsoul Mace Melee1"*****
        Thunderaxe Melee2"*3+3+-11

      • Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [260pts]

        Selections: 1. Terrifying Aspect, 3 Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [260pts], Grandstave, Tempest Blade and Stormstave

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, WIZARD, CORPUSCANT, DRACOLINE, Other, EVOCATORS

        Magic: Evocators, Spell: Empower, Terrifying Aspect, Unit: Evocators, Unit Abilities: Celestial Lightning Arc, Evocator-Prime, Evocators, Mount, Supernatural Roar, Thunderous Pounce, Weapon: Grandstave, Tempest Blade and Stormstave


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Evocators 1/1Empower
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Empower 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly REDEEMER or SACROSANCT unit wholly within 12" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Terrifying Aspect 5If successfully cast, pick a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL unit wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 3" of that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Evocators 12"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Celestial Lightning Arc You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks made with missile weapons that target this unit. In addition, after this unit has been picked to fight for the first time in a phase, after all of its attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. If you do so, roll 2 dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Evocator-Prime The leader of this unit is an Evocator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Evocator-Prime’s melee weapons.
        Evocators A unit of Evocators is a WIZARD while it has 2 or more models. It cannot attempt to cast any spells other than Empower, but any number of units of EVOCATORS can attempt to cast Empower in the same hero phase.
        Mount This unit’s Celestial Dracolines attack with their Monstrous Claws.
        Supernatural Roar Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units when they are within 3" of one or more friendly DRACOLINES.
        Thunderous Pounce You can re-roll charge rolls for this model. In addition, the Damage characteristic for this model's Monstrous Claws is D3 instead of 1 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Grandstave Melee2"33+3+-2
        Tempest Blade and Stormstave Melee1"43+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Hammers of Sigmar, Stormkeep

          Battle Trait: First to be Forged, Mortal Auxilliaries, Shield of Civilisation, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Soul of the Stormhost


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        First to be Forged Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units.
        Mortal Auxilliaries 1 in every 4 units in a Stormkeep army can be a CITIES OF SIGMAR unit. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of those units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly LIBERATORS unit. In addition, when you pick a unit to benefit from a command ability from Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, you can treat those units as if they were STORMCAST ETERNALS units.
        Shield of Civilisation Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly LIBERATORS units. In addition, at the end of your movement phase, you can pick any friendly LIBERATORS units that
        did not move and were not set up in that phase and say they will stand fast. If you do so, until your next movement phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by those units, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target those units.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Soul of the Stormhost You can use this command ability when a friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR REDEEMER unit is destroyed. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 5+ a new unit identical to the one that was destroyed is added to your army. Set up the new unit anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy models. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.
